metadata.title: CVE-2009-1143 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - negligible
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in open-vm-tools 2009.03.18-154848. Local users canbypass intended access restrictions on mounting shares via a symlink attackthat leverages a realpath race condition in mount.vmhgfs (aka hgfsmounter).

criterions.comment: open-vm-tools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
